name: Tempest Wolf
desc: A dire wolf infused with the powers of a wind spirit, using it to conjure great blasts of wind. This spirit beast specializes in powerful attacks with its bite that trigger off the grappled condition while moving both enemies and allies around the initiative order.

name: Havoc Wolf
desc: A spirit beast that punishes foes by inflicting Fear on them, then limiting their ability to escape with their sharp grappling fangs.

name: Galespeed Wolf
desc: A small, blisteringly fast wolf that enhances its movement with the essence of wind.
